Module fastwritinggame
Package com.fastwriting.controller

Class StatisticsController

java.lang.Object
com.fastwriting.controller.StatisticsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class StatisticsController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for the statistics interface. Displays detailed game performance statistics and metrics.
Since:
2024
Version:
1.0
